short_description: Fast path function to split input table into train and test datasets
long_description: Fast path function to split input dataset into train dataset and test dataset as per mentioned trainSize and testSize as arguments

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the name of the table that contains input dataset on which split to be performed.
input_tables.description: Specifies the name of the table that contains input dataset on which split to be performed.

argument_clauses.name: IDColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the IDColumn.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the name of the InputTable column that contains the unique value for to get the deterministic row in each function call.

argument_clauses.name: StratifyColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the stratify classes.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the name of the InputTable column that contains the stratify classes of the TD_TrainTestSplit.

argument_clauses.name: seed
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the seed value for the function to select the rows for train and test randomly . The seed must be a NUMERIC value in the range [1, 2147483647]. The seed is used in function for uniform real distribution to randomly select the rows for train and test dataset.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the seed value for the function to select the rows for train and test randomly . The seed must be a NUMERIC value in the range [1, 2147483647]. The seed is used in function for uniform real distribution to randomly select the rows for train and test dataset.

argument_clauses.name: trainSize
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the trainSize value for the function to select the number of rows for train table . The trainSize must be a FLOAT value in the range (0.0, 1.0). The default value for the trainSize is 0.75 .
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the trainSize value for the function to select the number of rows for train table . The trainSize must be a FLOAT value in the range (0.0, 1.0). The default value for the trainSize is 0.75 .

argument_clauses.name: testSize
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the testSize value for the function to select the number of rows for test table . The testSize must be a FLOAT value in the range (0.0, 1.0). The default value for the testSize is 0.25 .
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the testSize value for the function to select the number of rows for test table . The testSize must be a FLOAT value in the range (0.0, 1.0). The default value for the testSize is 0.25 .
